body_html:
@hemecha I am currently having the same issue. I was able to build TensorFlow using CMake and use it in Visual Studio with the /WHOLEARCHIVE flag, but I'm having trouble finding an alternative in Qt. Would you be able to shed some light regarding how you generated libprotobuf.lib and tensorflow.lib and then linked them in Qt?

Thanks in advance!

I was able to build TensorFlow using CMake and use it in Visual Studio with the /WHOLEARCHIVE flag, but I'm having trouble finding an alternative in Qt.
